Articles.Content: My name is LoserKid, but in real life I am Evan! I have been playing Kerbal Space Program ever since .25 and from there I have learned how to do tremendous things. I have landed on Mun once (planning to do more) and got into orbit countless times! See you around.

Greetings Evan. I remember my first trip to the Moon, very thrilling indeed.

See you around, and happy 1.0 (and patches)!

Hey Evan!

Welcome to the forums.

I too remember my first Mun landing, very exciting! That experience was one of my fondest!

See you around, and all the best with your future KSP endeavors.
